entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 02:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
